text: Raak College of Engineering and Technology is an engineering college located in Puducherry, India. It is a part of Farouk Educational Trust, which was established in the year 2003 by the founder and Chairman B. Mohamed Farouk. The institution is affiliated to Pondicherry University and is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Engineering colleges in Puducherry
title: Raak College of Engineering and Technology
